/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -g   CMakeFiles/surface.dir/viz3d/object.cc.o CMakeFiles/surface.dir/viz3d/ppoly.cc.o CMakeFiles/surface.dir/viz3d/acp.cc.o CMakeFiles/surface.dir/viz3d/poly.cc.o CMakeFiles/surface.dir/viz3d/viz3d.cc.o CMakeFiles/surface.dir/deps/glad/glad.c.o  -o surface -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lGLU -lGL -lGLEW /root/anaconda2/lib/libmpfr.so -lrt -lm -ldl -lX11 -lpthread -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -Wl,-rpath,/root/anaconda2/lib
